fields.name: reference_number
fields.title: Reference Number
fields.description: This field is populated by the user with the reference number of the trip. This number is a mandatory system requirement when publishing a template.

fields.name: minister
fields.title: Title of Minister
fields.description: This field will display the title of the Minister who requested the trip.

fields.name: purpose_en
fields.title: Purpose of the trip (English)
fields.description: A description of the reason for the government trip in question. The description should be succinct (one line if possible) and provide users with a general sense of the trip's purpose. Use of acronyms should be avoided, in English.

fields.name: purpose_fr
fields.title: Purpose of the trip (French)
fields.description: A description, in French, of the reason for the government trip in question. The description should be succinct (one line if possible) and provide users with a general sense of the trip's purpose. Use of acronyms should be avoided, in French

fields.name: end_date
fields.title: Travel end date
fields.description: The date the travel ended (can be the same as travel start date).

fields.name: locations_en
fields.title: Location(s) visited (English)
fields.description: To include names of all places visited to conduct government business during the trip in question, in English. (separate multiple locations with semicolons)

fields.name: locations_fr
fields.title: Location(s) visited (French)
fields.description: To include names of all places visited to conduct government business during the trip in question, in french. (separate multiple locations with semicolons)

fields.name: passengers
fields.title: Passenger names
fields.description: Full list of flight passengers. (Comma seperated)

fields.name: additional_information_en
fields.title: Additional Information (English)
fields.description: This field will display any additional information, as deemed necessary, in English.

fields.name: additional_information_fr
fields.title: Additional Information (French)
fields.description: This field will display any additional information, as deemed necessary, in French.
